detectors.description:
IcoOKOToken.fallback() (repairResNew/scscN/ClassyCoinR1U1.sol#156-172) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(now <= endTime && now >= startTime) (repairResNew/scscN/ClassyCoinR1U1.sol#157)
	- require(bool)(totalTokensSold < maxTokensToSold) (repairResNew/scscN/ClassyCoinR1U1.sol#159)
	- require(bool)(tokensToSend >= 1000000 && tokensToSend <= 350000000000) (repairResNew/scscN/ClassyCoinR1U1.sol#162)
	- valueToReturn > 0 (repairResNew/scscN/ClassyCoinR1U1.sol#166)
